companies.title: Companies
companies.description: List of company names to extract contacts from (e.g., ['SAP', 'Siemens', 'Bosch'])

country.title: Country/Region

maxRetries.title: Max Retries
maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retries for failed requests

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Select proxies to be used by your actor.
